snippet.title: Power Rangers Super Samurai on Kinect for XBOX 360 - Release Trailer !!
snippet.description:
BECOME A SUPER SAMURAI RANGER!
Prepare to experience Saban's Power Rangers Super Samurai universe in an entirely new way. Using the hands-free Xbox 360™Kinect Sensor, morph into the Red, Blue, Green, Yellow or Pink Ranger and master the mystical and ancient Samurai Symbols of Power that control the elements of Fire, Water, Forest, Earth and Sky!
For more information check out : http://namcobandaigames.com/powerrangers/

Join the community!
www.facebook.com/NamcoBandai

Chat with us on www.twitter.com/NamcoGames & www.twitter.com/FilthieRich
